News.Title: Richa Info Systems Signs 1 Billion Rupee Agreement with Roopyaa Tradebizz
News.Summary: Richa Info Systems has entered into a supply and services agreement with Roopyaa Tradebizz. The agreement is valued at 1 billion rupees (approximately $12 million USD). This deal represents a significant business transaction for Richa Info Systems and could potentially impact its future operations and financial performance.
